Ground Integer Sets

(Ground) integer sets are simply sorted, duplicate-free lists of integers e.g. 

        SetOfThree = [1,3,7]
        EmptySet = []
Lists which contain non-integers, are unsorted or contain duplicates, are not sets in the sense of this library.


Warwick Harvey
2005-01-25
